title: Candidate Interview: Backend Engineer

content.transcript: Interviewer: Can you explain your experience with RESTful API design? Candidate: I have built several APIs using Node.js and Express, focusing on resource modeling, versioning, and authentication. Interviewer: How do you ensure performance? Candidate: I utilize caching strategies, database indexing, and load testing.

summary: Interview covered API design, performance optimization, and testing strategies. Candidate demonstrated strong experience in Node.js.
